SEARCH
Package gw.api.util

Class FXRateUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.util.FXRateUtil
public class FXRateUtil extends Object
Defines utility methods and classes for converting monetary amounts from one currency to another.
Author:
jwong

    • convertAmount

      public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom, Currency convertTo)
      Convert a monetary amount to another in the specified currency.
      Parameters:
      convertFrom - The monetary amount to convert.
      convertTo - The currency to which the amount is to be converted.
      Returns:
      The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

    • convertAmount

      public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom, Currency convertTo, FXRateMarket usingMarket)
      Convert a monetary amount to another in the specified currency using the specified market to obtain the most recent conversion rate.
      Parameters:
      convertFrom - The monetary amount to convert.
      convertTo - The currency to which the amount is to be converted.
      usingMarket - The market from which to obtain the conversion rate.
      Returns:
      The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

    • convertAmount

      public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom, Currency convertTo, Date marketTime)
      Convert a monetary amount to another in the specified currency with the specified effective time from the default market.
      Parameters:
      convertFrom - The monetary amount to convert.
      convertTo - The currency to which the amount is to be converted.
      marketTime - The time for which to obtain the conversion rate.
      Returns:
      The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

    • convertAmount

      public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom, Currency convertTo, Date marketTime, FXRateMarket usingMarket)
      Convert a monetary amount to another in the specified currency using the specified market to obtain the most recent conversion rate.
      Parameters:
      convertFrom - The monetary amount to convert.
      convertTo - The currency to which the amount is to be converted.
      marketTime - The time for which to obtain the conversion rate.
      usingMarket - The market from which to obtain the conversion rate.
      Returns:
      The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

    • convertAmount

      public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom, FXRate fxRate)
      Convert a monetary amount to another using the specified foreign exchange rate.
      Parameters:
      convertFrom - The monetary amount to be converted.
      fxRate - The foreign exchange rate to be used to convert the amount.
      Returns:
      The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

    • convertAmount

      @Deprecated public static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(CurrencyAmount convertFrom, FXRate fxRate)
      Deprecated.

    • convertAmount

      public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount from, Currency to, Date marketTime, FXRateMarket market, Currency baseCurrency)
      Converts a MonetaryAmount from one currency to another based on the specified exchange rate market information.
      Parameters:
      from - The source MonetaryAmount to be converted.
      to - The target currency code for the conversion.
      marketTime - The effective market time for obtaining exchange rates.
      market - The exchange rate market to use for the conversion.
      baseCurrency - The base currency for exchange rate calculation.
      Returns:
      A new MonetaryAmount representing the converted value in the target currency.

    • convertAmount

      public static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(CurrencyAmount from, Currency to, Date marketTime, FXRateMarket market, Currency baseCurrency)
      Converts a CurrencyAmount from one currency to another based on the specified exchange rate market information.
      Parameters:
      from - The source CurrencyAmount to be converted.
      to - The target currency code for the conversion.
      marketTime - The effective market time for obtaining exchange rates.
      market - The exchange rate market to use for the conversion.
      baseCurrency - The base currency for exchange rate calculation.
      Returns:
      A new CurrencyAmount representing the converted value in the target currency.

    • convertAmount

      public static <T extends IMoney> T convertAmount(T fromAmount, FXRate fxRate)
      Converts a generic IMoney from one currency to another based on the specified exchange rate market information.
      Parameters:
      fxRate - The exchange rate information.
      Returns:
      A new IMoney representing the converted value in the target currency.

    • getFXRate

      public static FXRate getFXRate(Currency from, Currency to, Date marketTime, FXRateMarket market, Currency baseCurrency)
      Get a conversion rate based on the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      from - The currency from the amount to be converted.
      to - The currency to which the amount is to be converted.
      marketTime - The time for which to obtain the conversion rate.
      market - The market type from which to obtain the conversion rate.
      baseCurrency - The base currency used to identify rate sets.
      Returns:
      a conversion rate.

    • makeContextBuilder

      public static FXRateContextImpl.Builder makeContextBuilder(FXRateContext context)
      Return a new foreign exchange rate context builder whose values are derived from the specified foreign exchange rate context.
      Parameters:
      context - A foreign exchange rate context.
      Returns:
      A foreign exchange rate context builder

    • makeContextBuilder

      public static FXRateContextImpl.Builder makeContextBuilder(Currency fromCurrency, Currency toCurrency)
      Return a new foreign exchange rate context builder between the specified currencies.
      Parameters:
      fromCurrency - The currency from which to convert using a rate.
      toCurrency - The currency to which to convert using a rate.
      Returns:
      A foreign exchange rate context builder.
